title: The Grief Nurse
description: Imagine you could be rid of your sadness, your anxiety, your heartache, your fear.Imagine you could take those feelings from others and turn them into something beautiful.Lynx is a Grief Nurse. Kept by the Asters, a wealthy, influential family, to ensure they’re never troubled by negative emotions, she knows no other life.When news arrives that the Asters’ eldest son is dead, Lynx does what she can to alleviate their Sorrow. As guests flock to the Asters’ private island for the wake, bringing their own secrets, lies and grief, tensions rise.Then the bodies start to pile up.With romance, intrigue and spectacular gothic world-building, this spellbinding debut novel is immersive and unforgettable.
author: Angie Spoto
